summary: Remake of Immersive Armors for NPCs for hothtrooper44\'s version 6 of Immersive Armors.
descriptionHtml:
I have, in good faith, replicated toolmjk\'s mod from scratch. No duplicate armors.

There may be minor differences between this and his mod (eye patches and capes at worst) but should be a good 100% replacement to his outdated mod.

If toolmjk desires I will remove this mod at any time.

Load after Immersive Armors. They may be naked at first. Go to a cell without any affected NPCs and wait 24 hours or play normally and they will in one days time be in proper gear.
author: Gorbachev
